name: imtired
description:
"imtired" is an adventure game set in a dream-like world. The game features randomly generated islands! Explore and find out what happened. Get energy for your rocket so you can leave the planet but be careful there are all kinds of dangers lurking around. Don't forget that you also require energy to function! Zero energy means game over with no saves.

Keep in mind this is an early alpha version of the game. Please comment down below and tell me what you think about it!

Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/GreyRealityStudios

Steam Group: https://steamcommunity.com/groups/GreyRealityStudios
